John Henry Price

  1. Foster Name: John Raymond
  2. Foster Family: Charles B. Harmon
  3. Location of Family: Auburn, NE
  4. Sending Organization: n/a
  5. Arrival Place: Auburn, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: Unknown
  7. Date of Birth: 1905-09-30, Schenectady, NY
  8. Gender: male
  9. Source: Nemaha County Herald (Auburn, NE), 18 December 1914; Nemaha County Republican (Auburn, NE), 18 December 1914; Article by John Harmon; Crossroads, May 1990, 6; Omaha World-Herald, 27 September 1987; Eloise Thomsen Corres.
